localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit

blogPost.excerpt: Transcribe your YouTube video in one click and highlight the important stuff for easy and quick reading. you-tldr let's you skim through the video transcript and skip to the good stuff. You can also download the transcript for your records.
blogPost.body: Transcribe your YouTube video in one click and highlight the important stuff for easy and quick reading. you-tldr let's you skim through the video transcript and skip to the good stuff. You can also download the transcript for your records.
blogPost.title: you-tldr - Get the tldr of any YouTube video in seconds
blogPost.author: Bilal Tahir

localize.description: 只需单击一下即可转录您的YouTube视频，并突出显示重要内容，以便轻松快速阅读。你-tldr让我们先浏览一下视频记录，然后跳到好的部分。您也可以下载文字记录作为您的记录。
localize.tagline: 在几秒钟内获得任何YouTube视频的tldr

localize.description: 只需單擊一下即可轉錄您的YouTube視頻，並突出顯示重要內容，以便輕鬆快速閱讀。你-tldr讓我們先瀏覽一下視頻記錄，然後跳到好的部分。您也可以下載文字記錄作爲您的記錄。
localize.tagline: 在幾秒鐘內獲得任何YouTube視頻的tldr
